website_summaries.verdict: The HP Stream 11-y010nr's rockcbottom price and cute design make it a good choice for a kid's first notebook.
pros: Includes a year of Office 365 Personal
cons: Low-res screen with narrow viewing angles

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Technical have been useless. Spent over an hour trying to get someone ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nightmare for me. Constantly freezes. No space for updates. No contact details for seller. Amazon Technical have been useless. Spent over an hour trying to get someone to call me to try and solve. NO response. Trying to return but getting nowhere. Looks like I've wasted my money which I could well do without. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Penelope T.

customer_reviews.title: What is worse is you cannot use a USB drive to resolve ...
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD NEVER BUY THIS ITEM AGAIN. The hard drive is too small, so as soon as there is an update - the hard drive is not large enough to cope (even if you delete everything you possibly can). What is worse is you cannot use a USB drive to resolve the issue. Whilst they seem a great buy (and work perfectly until there is a Windows update) ... they are impossible to keep updated (and therefore secure etc). IMO these items are not fit for purpose. I will happily correct this if HP can explain how it's done (something I've not found from hours of googling, various attempts etc)
customer_reviews.author: ajez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this laptop. I do not have anything downloaded. Not even attempted to watch youtube on it. I have only used publisher or word to write timesheets. This laptop is sooooo slow. It takes ages loading. You havto click on things multiple times b4 it starts loading. Just clicking on print takes 10 seconds to load up. I could understand if i had been on loads of websites or downloaded loads. But it is blank. And its torture
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Unfortunately I had ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Unfortunately I had to return my first laptop as after about a month, it started randomly freezing. It got more and more common to the point where t was basically unusable. Thankfully amazon sent me a new one and as long as you are only using it for basic things, it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of effort!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop or as I was told by the Technician today, it's a tablet with external keyboard; cannot handle basic updates from Windows 10, it is always out of space and I have no personal file stored. I even ended up removing the Microsoft office because of problems due to lack of space.... Today i tried to upgrade the hard drive and was told it's impossible to upgrade :( this is not even worth making! And hp should be ashamed of this Neolithic machine!
customer_reviews.author: Bibbie

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the worst PC I have used in my life.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this laptop given the HP brand a coupe months ago and as soon as we opened windows (the basic OS) it downloaded so many side apps there was 0 memory left, slowing the pc down and preventing even Windows update assistance to work! I really would expect more from HP and of Amazon when vetting products of such low quality. I would very much like a refund on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 tech that doesn't have the memory to run Windows 10 updates!
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Windows 10 tech that doesn't have the memory to run Windows 10 updates!
customer_reviews.author: JSAlexander

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough memory to update Windows 10 so is rendered useless. A complete waste of money. I complained to HP and they were uncaring and basically said 'Caveat emptor' - buyer beware. Amazon on the other hand were brilliant.... but why are they still selling this?
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is such a slow computer that it won’t even run the windows package that comes with it. We have hardly anything stored on it and it says that of 32gb storage we have used 29!! Scrolling on the screen makes it freeze! Rubbish!!! I know it’s cheap but we only need something simple.... that said we still need it to do what it states in the description!
customer_reviews.author: MalakaisMum

customer_reviews.title: First and last HP !!!
customer_reviews.text: Constantly tells me it is running out of storage space then starts downloading updates on apps I do not use....so goodbye apps to free up space then it starts a download to update windows 10 and says it does not have the space !!!***??? All I have on it is Skype and some music...where the F*** is the 4Gb of Ram ????
customer_reviews.author: mr paul walden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and NASTY
customer_reviews.text: Crap Keeps crashing with screen full of random pixels Always seems to crash when I have just typed in a big load of work forcing me to start again time after time Cannot update windows on it. DO NOT BUY. I bought 2. One my son uses does not crash. My one crashes randomly. Sometimes 10 times a day. Some times it might go for 2 days without crashing. Usually in between.
customer_reviews.author: G. Christophorou

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Slow. 83% of storage (25GB) taken by Windows.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy HP laptops for myself, which I find quite good. I thought I would buy my kids their first. To be honest I'm quite disappointed. HP shouldn't be doing a product that is THAT slow in 2018. It's annoying. Most of all, both HP and Amazon should warn buyers that over 25GB, out of a total 30GB, are taken by the default Windows 10 system. That leaves you with less than 5GB storage. After a normal 3 months use and storage of a few photos and videos, it is almost full. Windows will permanently ask you to erase files, in order to be able to update its system. The rest is OK (design, weight, hardware, ecc).
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Can be set up as a mini- recording studio that doesn't weigh a ton!
customer_reviews.text: Dunno why people are moaning about this product! I got this little laptop out of its box, powered it up, Installed Bandlab, My Cakewalk (which used to be called Sonar LE) DAW and the WAV converter for my Boss BR800 eight- track recorder and still had 6.23 Gb space on the little 32Gb Virtual HDD; more than enough for my work. I'm a Professional Bass Guitarist and I need proper tools for my job; this little machine is the bomb! It's the works; has a combination input/output so works with my Bandlab interface AND my smartphone headphones; I can now record new songs ANYWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: Mick Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is alright, a tad slow but for the price you can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: RealSnowWhite

customer_reviews.title: I have been cheated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. As soon as I loaded up the printer software the laptop was completely unusable - no memory left at all. I sent it back to Amazon within the time limit - it was signed for. I have heard nothing from Amazon so now they have my money and they have had the laptop back. There doesn't seem to be any way of contacting anyone. A complete con
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Useless
customer_reviews.text: I dont know where to begin with this piece of trash. Literally, all I needed this for was to surf the web and watch some videos and it csnt even do that. It is UNUSABLE when it's plugged in AND it runs and dangerously hot temperatures. I am disgusted at myself for ever spending money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but do-able
customer_reviews.text: Got this for course work only. Took a bit of research to get it set up how I wanted and bypass update issues due to low memory. But now I have tailored it and clean out stuff I didn’t want it runs fine. Not the best but for the price it does what want, is light to carry around. Really a cloud book so don’t expect to store much but have found 11gb by removing unwanted programmes etc, keep it clean to run well. Bloatware from HP is needed as it runs with Microsoft programmes to keep it sweet but you can manually turn off stuff you don’t want or use.
customer_reviews.author: Hellyn Davidson Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Avoid avoid avoid
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is absolutely awful. A complete waste of money. The memory on it is so small it’s useless. I bought it for my son to use and do his homework and he can’t as the memory is full on the laptop just with program updates using up the space. This laptop is utter rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Slow with no memory
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to do a home study course. It ran very slowly on first start up so I got frustrated and closed it down. 2nd start up, it decided to do updates for 6 hours. I've had to uninstall practically all applications just so I can do an assignment as it says the memory is full before even using it and i had to wait around for it to think about what it was doing. I wouldn't recommend this laptop. Slow and disappointing. I suppose you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Average laptop for any everyday needs but will lack if you're demanding very heavy graphics power
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very bad in reviews and i can certainly see why. for any of these machines i would recommend windows 8.1 32 bit and you will notice how much smoother that is. Yes HP does not provide downgrade rights so you will not get official driver support. You have to get hold of a wireless dongle and download a third party driver checker. Very nice design no over heating, operates quietly. If you're going to be doing any work you're going to need external storage but that isn't a problem and don't expect to play DVDs on here without any external media either.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not great with internet browsing. Quite slow.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop keeps shutting down. This is the third one I've bought and the same thing has happened. Maybe a faulty batch. The last two I presume are faulty. And it's rocket science to figure out how to activate the 1TB of storage you are supposed to get with the deal. I still haven't figured it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lady C

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. Total waste of my money. Bought it as a basic laptop just for internet browsing. Havent downloaded or added any programs or anything and within a month it already had no space available even to download the windows updates. It is basically unusable as it just freezes as vital updates are required.
customer_reviews.author: waddy

customer_reviews.title: DO YOURSELF A FAVOUR & AVOID THIS LAPTOP OR ANY LAPTOP UNDER 100GB
customer_reviews.text: AVOID.! AVOID AVOID Very disappointed with this windows 10 laptop because it doesnt have enough space to store run or update. This shouldve never been sold as a useable laptop with windows 10. Very disappointed with HP for selling this. I now have a laptop with blue screen of death theres not enough room to even wiped the drive so I have to buy a new laptop. It struggled from the 2nd month of having it so couldnt send back to Amazon. Buy something else with a bigger inbuilt storage
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Love my laptop it's perfect for someone that studies that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my laptop it's perfect for someone that studies that what I use mine for mostly. I got a word package with the lap top so that was a massive boost for me if say. It dmgrwat for going online to. It's a little slow at times but for the price and the package I got I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So bad it's worse than a toy computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I have an ipad but prefer the feel of a PC when typing, wanted something light and easy to transport/travel. The spec looked reasonable. Disappointed is an understatement. It feels like a cheap childs toy but less useful. Its slow, the buttons stick, storage & battery life are poor. 1 TB of cloud storage cam with it but even this was not easy to access. . Unfortunately there was only a month to return item otherwise I would have sent back. Don't waste your money on this. it's really terrible.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very useful indeed, great price and delivered speedily
customer_reviews.author: Robert Young

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient memory for windows updates
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this machine unless you also purchase an external hard drive. When windows needs to do it's updates there is always insufficient memory in order to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Wellie3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the size and price but can bit a little slow at times apart from that its great
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for Windows X
customer_reviews.text: This laptop would be ideal for light use however it has a fundamental flaw which makes it unusable. The hard drive is only 32gb which means it isn’t physically big enough to handle Windows X updates. Even by using an external usb drive you will have to virtually wipe the hard drive clean in order to update windows X and as the OS continues to take up more hard drive space it will eventually become impossible to update the Windows X OS. Avoid this laptop at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is brilliant and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend that you DON'T buy an HP Stream. Apart from the fact that it has next to no storage capacity, after six months or less of use it repeatedly shuts down of its own accord and is agonisingly slow when it is actually running. In short an expensive piece of junk from HP who are supposedly a trustworthy brand. Most annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for basic computing. Microsoft office/emails etc. Never known a computer to be so slow. Constantly 'Not responding' yet it updates every time it gets switched on. Takes 10-15mins to even start because of the slow updating.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Emma Kenny

customer_reviews.title: No way a substitute for a real PC
customer_reviews.text: Virtually useless if you want to install apps locally on the device itself as it only has 32GB of local storage. My advice is to spend a couple of hundred more and get something that has decent storage. This device needs a fast and reliable internet connection to be any way useful, if you dont have this then it will be slow and you will end up getting frustrated and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. ACR

customer_reviews.title: No storage
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this computer Christmas 2018. I use it to access the internet and emailing. Nothing else, no games or watching tv etc. It has absolutely no storage, we have followed every instruction the computer has given us and it still says running out of storage can't download updates. It is really slow and won't even let me delete emails unless I turn it off and on again. My son in law who is a bit of a whizz on computers couldn't see what the problem is. DON'T BUY ABSOLUTE PANTS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good or useful as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Great service but, the item itself is not worth the money, within 1 month it was unable to be updated with software because the memory was not enough, only useful if you just want to access the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkieman

customer_reviews.title: AS A BASIC COMPUTER GOOD
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent laptop if you just want an easy to use pc. The memory isn't that good, my mistake in reading it's write up. I download lots of movies, but this one only has space for a little more than a dozen, so I have to move them to an external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: James Leatherbarrow

customer_reviews.title: Everything seemed great about this at first
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed great about this at first, lovely colour, good battery life. Only it was a little slow until one day I was watching netflix and it completely crashed. Fun times.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Low storage
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks the storage is already full because of systems updates. I now desperately need a laptop with more storage 54gb must be enough. I will ask to change.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value little laptop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs, mainly social media, email and document creation. Comes with free years subscription to Microsoft Office too which is great. Great lightweight laptop. Good quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Shandrews

customer_reviews.title: Avoid - unable to update Windows
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a laptop, until you hit windows update... then you are in big trouble. Simply put - the 32 GB eMMC drive is utterly useless and insufficient for any Windows updates. You will then be stuck with an out of date and flawed OS. Better to avoid and buy something with 64Gb minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Zen99

customer_reviews.title: Small internal storage makes this unsuitable for Win10
customer_reviews.text: With Windows 10 and MS Office installed there is no space for anything else, including significant Windows updates. Microsoft won't let you quietly ignore updates any longer so you are constantly pestered to perform updates that will fail. Wiping and reinstalling a fresh copy of Windows saved a little space, but Windows creates a lot of junk files that are hard to identify and disk cleanup wont sort. Ultimately this device is just not suitable for running Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R L Snow

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as gaming laptop as it was for my children for online gaming and it doesn’t do what it says there useless for gaming plus the amazon driver who delivered the product containing £400 worth of tech he placed the box on the wall and it fell off the wall crashed into the pavement rushed off without a word of an apology and speeded off in His van!
customer_reviews.author: kerry lovell

customer_reviews.title: HP Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit that was easy to set up and is easy to use. 1 months guarantee for security as part of the package from Afee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would like to send it manually
customer_reviews.text: Navigation mouse faulty. I want to send this back but do not have a printer. Would like to send it manually. Cannot find person to contact to do this however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: Great for browsing, good battery life, then the hard drive fills up with Windows updates and renders it useless, had to re download my Norton on renewal and could not do it because of no space, complete waste of money do not buy, I have no files of my own on the pc, just use it for browsing and now it's full and can't be used, avoid like the plague!
customer_reviews.author: Porky

customer_reviews.title: Complete lack of storage. Had to return after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, had to return this laptop after a week of using it. 30gb is definitely not enough since the laptop always needs to update. After 2 days of using it, the laptop already was reminding me to open up more space since there was a lack of storage space. However, I didn't install anything and saved all my work on my external hard drive so it didn't make any sense that it already finished all the storage.
customer_reviews.author: LOLA

customer_reviews.title: Good for watching movies and browsing internet
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice laptop but with a very small memory Not many things that you can do with it
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my secong one of these due to a loss of the first. Great value for money and I like it enormously. Always slightly short of space so get a high value SD card to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: leoandrew

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish laptop
customer_reviews.text: When it arrives almost the entire memory is used up with all the stuff already loaded. I removed tge ones i could but it wont let you remove most of them. If you want an ornament that's not fit for purpose this is the laptop for you!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Poor memory space once you have put office on it you have virtually zero space to download anything else, it was bought for school work and he absolutely hates it runs far too slow and not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: dudz

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: It has now totally died after less than 2 years!! Do not waste your money, rubbish!! Although not expensive there are many out there for the same price with great reviews!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Second one we've had now after the first went faulty, this one broke exactly the same way, keys got pushed in within a week and laptop was incredibly slow all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is rubbish. You can’t add any additional software as it hasn’t even got enough capacity to let windows update. Spoke to a computer specialist who says it can’t be upgraded and have wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Big spender

customer_reviews.title: It's a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy this laptop because there is not enough storage for any updates and office 365 mentioned doesn't come with it. Laptop constantly requesting for updates but can't because there isn't enough storage therefore asking to fix issues. I am escalating this issue as the seller refused to see the problem and this is a rip off
customer_reviews.author: DVD not compatible with DVD player

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY GOOD, not enough storage and my husband was not ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT VERY GOOD, not enough storage and my husband was not happy with it at all. We tried to clear personal documents and it was impossible to do. It will be going as soon as we can get rid.
customer_reviews.author: Daline S.B Langford

customer_reviews.title: Laptop needs extra storage!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely colour however not much storage space. The majority of storage space is rubbish that is already downloaded on the device, recommend when buying this laptop you buy additional storage to plug in, other then that it’s ok
customer_reviews.author: ��Jessica Short��

customer_reviews.title: This laptop was bought as my sons first laptop and ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was bought as my sons first laptop and he's never off it. Always sat doing his homework or watching YouTube or something. It's never off his body
customer_reviews.author: fiona taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight laptop and that’s the best I can say about it. It is painfully slow and definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the worst buy ever. The lack of storage was totally inadequate and I would like to advise other customers not to buy. A computer expert told me he thought they should be taken off the Market.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift good price arrived two days after ordering excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: do not BUY this item !!!
customer_reviews.text: do not go anywhere near this item. Cannot increase 32GB hard drive. no room for Windows 10 updates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Office 365 subscription is NOT included.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop itself is quite good. The description clearly states that a one year subscription to Office 365 is included. It’s quite a shock to find out that you have to pay £50 at checkout. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the worst looking laptop ever. Definitely go for something more expensive. Its cheap, but it looks and feels like a toy laptop. Sooooo awful
customer_reviews.author: Greg Matthews

customer_reviews.title: no storage capacity -
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product - I cannot get any updates as there is NO STORAGE CAPACITY - SO I cannot carry out ANY HP necessary updates - which has made this laptop UNSAFE and open to viruses! I have had it under a year and will be returning it to Amazon shortly for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: It's good for first laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's good little laptop.. I got it for my daughter first one happy with it so far. Struggling to update it as not enough memory.. but it's doing what it's ment too
customer_reviews.author: wenglishs

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was great... for about 2 weeks. I bought this as I was going to university and really couldn't afford much as my old laptop suddenly broke. This seemed fine up until I started actually using it. Simply because the hard drive is so small, it's just not worth it, even for the price. It causes too much stress when I can't so much as download a powerpoint for a lecture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic really simple to use just what kids wanted for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic really simple to use just what kids wanted for uni even thinking of buying neice & nephew one for christmas
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Acton

customer_reviews.title: Light on the weight and wallet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for ocassional and/or light use. Portable and good value mostly. Not good for gaming obviously nor graphic/video editing etc. Good for those bits when a tablet wont do.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Please save your money, this was a total waste of money and by far my worst purchase on Amazon. The memory does not offer you anything, if I could, I would return it in a heartbeat. Save your money this is a dead end deal. I took it to the shop today and the guy diagnosed my problem before I had time to explain.
customer_reviews.author: Leon wright

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work properly. Doesnt even switch on. And when is on...is so slow.
customer_reviews.author: Pt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, not enough memory to do basic updates. Nice looking computer and easy to use but would not recommend as the storage is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you my son likes it but it’s I but slow at loading he says but a over all it do won’t he needs it for
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Recommend !  Good Value !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. Needed charging upon arrival. Looks just like New , perfect. Working Great , no problems ! Worth Every Penny ! Would definitely recommend this product and company !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HP ? Hardly Practical ?
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Can’t understand how HP would ever put their name to such a poor product. Unresponsive touch pad, shockingly slow, poor memory and unable to install any Windows 10 updates. Never impulse on Black Friday....it rarely ends well !!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Laptop itself is cute but it can't even handle basic windows updates and when it starts having issues with storage and you want to reset the thing it won't let you because..... not enough disk space 🙄 absolutely ridiculous - would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Awful performance
customer_reviews.text: This has the worst performing internet of any device, PC or phone I have had the misfortune to experience. Incredibly slow and unresponsive, coupled with a peculiar function where it just shuts down all open tabs without reason or warning - then as it is a Windows 10 system the old tabs have all disappeared so I have to relaunch them all again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Passmore

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend ⭐️🌟⭐️🌟⭐️🌟
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop. My daughter loved it. Seller delivered next day in time for her birthday. Thank you very much. ⭐️🌟⭐️🌟⭐️🌟
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Must agree with the reviews I ignored before purchase, memory is extremely low the little it has it taken up by essential software. Seems to be updating more than actually operating
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this laptop. It is not able to run windows 10. which makes you laptop crash as there is too much for such a little laptop to do! I sent it back to amazon after having it 10 months and i got a full refund on it! don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but have to pay for all extras. So not so cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Says it has 6 months free word and excel but only came with 3 months. Only had for few months and fraud warranty run out and have to renew.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Power

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for about a year and I can’t really fault it, sure I only mainly use it for coursework and the odd YouTube video but it works well for me. Storage is a slight issue but nothing a memory stick can’t resolve. Nice and lightweight, very easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Light but not enough memory
customer_reviews.text: Slimline, lightweight, mostly easy to set up. Insufficient memory for updates without using cloud. Problems with memory for games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: u
customer_reviews.text: brought for 13 year old sis .... good for watching movies ect and homework and research as far as I know .... fast for loading movies and youtube as such typical laptop .... wouldnt recommended for big games .... ex minecraft
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Liu

customer_reviews.title: Very poor build quality :(
customer_reviews.text: space button on keybord became intermittent after one week of use, and laptop stopped working after a few months due to insufficient memory, despite having nothing installed on it !
customer_reviews.author: C Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Small Memory Size - Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product barely a month ago but i am already disappointed in the incredibly small memory size. You really can't do much with it. I should've valued the numerous reviews on how bad the memory size is

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound on it an I thought there was a year Microsoft on but I only ha 4 months I got it for college

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a backup to my other computer. Nice enough, but in this day and age not enough memory and starting to run slow.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money,easy to operate would recommend to anyone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bargain xxx
customer_reviews.text: Bargain!!! 10 year old Daughter LOVES this product!!! Extremely pleased with this purchase!!

customer_reviews.title: small storage space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop as long as you don't have many updates of programmes added to it as it has quite a small storage.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The hard drive is so small I couldn't even install office 356... I mean I know its cheap but common.

customer_reviews.title: Okay depending on what you're using it for
customer_reviews.text: Not much memory once you've all the stuff that come pre installed is on , had a problem installing Windows 10 because of lack of memory

customer_reviews.title: Professional  seller!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight laptop! Unfortunately I haven't read proper the description and with sadness had to send it back. Chippest Electrical pleased to deal with. No any problems, quick action with sending item as well as deal with return. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ewa

customer_reviews.title: Super happy customer
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant super fast service. Ordered yesterday afternoon and received it this morning. What a cute little laptop. Neatly packaged. Easy start up. Best value for my money. My daughter is very happy with her laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for money, light weight and smart. very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY USELESS!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. The storage is not big enough to enable Microsoft updates. HP are aware of this but don’t appear to be bothered! Buy an iPad, you’ll be a lot happier.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Daniels

customer_reviews.text: After two years, the hard drive broke. I have to pay £150.00 to repay it.

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money as it keeps crashing and works very slowly.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot cope with the updates and you will need to reinstall windows
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use after a short time as the ultrabook cannot manage updating & now windows needs to be reinstalled - which is not with the contents. Tried various methods via the internet to resolve this matter without success.

customer_reviews.title: The worst ever paperweight
customer_reviews.text: The worst lap top or computer I have ever owned. Don’t buy it please.

product_meta.title: HP Stream 14-ax000na 14-inch HD Laptop (Aqua Blue) - (Intel Celeron N3060, 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, 1TB OneDrive and Office 365, 1 Year Subscription Included, Intel HD Graphics, Windows 10)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Blue| Size Name:14 InchCompletely connected. Perfectly productive. Designed for the always connected life, this nimble laptop lets you easily shift from homework workhorse to Marat honing your favorited shows. With its portable design and powerful Wi-Fi antenna, it delivers the essential productivity and features you want, without ever slowing you down. The latest wireless technology. The improved 802.11 ac 2x2 Wi-Fi antenna delivers a stronger, more reliable Internet connection than before, for buffer-free streaming, blazing-fast downloads, and smooth web surfing. Office 365 Personal included. Get full access to Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Access with the included one-year subscription, and easily store your files in the cloud with the 1 TB of OneDrive storage. Ultra-portable design. With a super thin, lightweight design, this laptop was never meant to stand still. It travels easily and comes in a vibrant, non-traditional colour for a uniquely personal look. HP Lounge, get closer to the Artists you love. With unlimited access to music and exclusive content for HP customers, there’s no need to search for it, as it comes to you.

BOX CONTAINS
HP Stream Laptop 14-ax000na & Power Adapter
feature_bullets: Ideal for basic computing whether at home or on the go, enjoy web browsing, social media, chatting, video calling, use office apps, emails and download apps

Office 365 Personal included; get full access to Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, OneNote and access with the included 1-year subscription and easily store your files in the cloud with the 1 TB of OneDrive storage
Ultra-portable design; with a thin, lightweight design, this laptop was never meant to stand still; it travels easily and comes in a vibrant, non-traditional colour for a distinctly personal look

The enhanced wireless technology; the improved 802.11 ac 2 x 2 Wi-Fi antenna delivers a stronger, more reliable internet connection than before for buffer-free streaming, blazing-fast downloads and smooth web surfing
If you have any issues activating the 1 year subscription, please refer to the video (situated on the gallery of this page) or contact HP support.
